alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Columbia and southern Rensselaer Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nassau, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nassau, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Averill Park, Sand Lake, East Nassau, Totem Lodge, East Schodack, Garfield, North Stephentown, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Hoag Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Malden Bridge, Riders Mills, Taborton, Glass Lake and Denault Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
